programme.title: The High Sierra
programme.desc: Journey into the highest reaches of the Sierra Nevada Mountains in this stunning video presentation featuring the fine art landscape photography of Elizabeth & Olof Carmel. Amazing scenes from "The Range of Light" are paired with beautiful instrumentals to create a relaxing and inspiring experience. Witness the drama of the seasons from summers magnificent wildflower meadows to the deep snows of winter.

programme.title: Journey Through Patagonia
programme.desc: Explore the unmatched wilderness of Patagonia in "Journey Through Patagonia". Magnificent peaks, unique wildlife, aerial glacier exploration, and dramatic skies await you in our most spectacular film yet! Run Time 1hour 45 minutes.

programme.title: Autumn Inspiration
programme.desc: Witness the beauty of the autumn seasons around the United States in this 35 minute program. This video showcases the diversity of our countrys spectacular landscapes. Experience changing colors, from the Sierra Nevada Mountains to the Rockies to the Eastern USA. The photography and cinematography of Olof and Elizabeth Carmel is paired with relaxing music to provide an exquisite "ambient art" experience for TV and mobile devices.

programme.title: Preview of Yellowstone & the Tetons Ambient Nature Film
programme.desc: Experience the majesty of Americas Yellowstone and Grand Teton National Parks. Soaring mountains, amazing wildlife, exploding geysers and bubbling geothermal ponds are the stars of this 2 hour ambient nature film. A soothing acoustic guitar soundtrack enhances the calming beauty of this film. Available to NatureStream.tv subscribers.

programme.title: Preview for "Sounds of the Sierra"
programme.desc: This is a preview for the 2 hour nature film Sounds of the Sierra which will be available on October 1. Immerse yourself in the enchanting sights and sounds of summer in the Sierra Nevada mountains. This film features beautiful alpine scenery accompanied by an array of soothing nature sounds: thundering waterfalls, flowing creeks, singing birds, rainfall, and a host of other sounds that create "natures summer symphony". The full 2 hour film is available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Preview for "Journey Through Patagonia"
programme.desc: Explore the unmatched wilderness of Patagonia in the 1:45 hour "Journey Through Patagonia". Magnificent peaks, unique wildlife, aerial glacier exploration, and dramatic sunrises await you in our most spectacular film yet! The full film is available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv

programme.title: Preview for "Winter's Grace, Sierra Mountains"
programme.desc: Experience the awe inspiring beauty of winter in "Winters Grace, Sierra Mountains". Witness Yosemites winter waterfalls, including the spectacular "Firefall" that happened in February 2021. Snowy forests, aerial views of majestic peaks, and winter sunset skies combine to create a wondrous winter experience in the newest release from NatureStream.tv. Runtime 90 minutes. The full film is available to subscribers at www.NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Preview of Point Reyes & Oregon Coast
programme.desc: This is a preview of "Point Reyes and the Oregon Coast, available to stream at www.NatureStream.tv. Enjoy over 2 hours of beautiful vistas, and explore the dramatic beauty of Point Reyes National Seashore & the stunning sea stacks of the Oregon Coast. Experience the calming effect of the seashore paired with a beautiful soundtrack.

programme.title: Meditating in Winter
programme.desc: Experience a relaxing guided meditation led by Mark Coleman paired with inspiring winter scenery.

programme.title: Preview for Arches & Canyonlands
programme.desc: The sublime landscape of Arches and Canyonlands area of Utah is the star in this 90 minute film, which showcases awe-inspiring natural arches, dramatic canyon vista sunrises & sunsets, and flights through arches and over the Colorado River canyon. The spectacular cinematography is accompanied by beautiful Native American flute music. Note: All Drone footage was filmed outside of National and State Park boundaries. Runtime 90 minutes. Available now to subscribers via www.NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Preview for Journey Through Pinnacles National Park
programme.desc: Immerse yourself in the rugged beauty of Pinnacles National Park, where towering rock spires, serene trails, and sweeping vistas come to life. Journey Through Pinnacles National Park captures the park’s unique landscapes, from sunlit cliffs to quiet caves and abundant wildlife. Let the peaceful sounds and stunning views transport you to one of California’s hidden natural gems. The full 45 minute film is available to subscribers of www.NatureStream.tv

programme.title: Preview of 5 Hour Crackling Fireplace
programme.desc: Enjoy a the sights and sounds of a glowing fire for 5 hours in Parts 1 and 2 of Crackling Fireplace in 4k - by NatureStream.tv. To get full access to visit www.NatureStream.tv and subscribe!

programme.title: Preview For "Yosemite Waterfalls & Wildflowers" 2 Hour Relaxing Nature Film
programme.desc: Available to stream on May 29, 2021. In the Spring Yosemites spectacular waterfalls combine with an exquisite display of Dogwood blossoms to create an awe inspiring experience like no other. Immerse yourself in the wonders of Yosemite in this 2 hour relaxing nature film "Yosemite, Waterfalls & Wildflowers". The spectacular cinematography is accompanied by a beautiful acoustic guitar soundtrack. Available at www.NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Preview for "Autumn Exhilaration" 2 Hour Nature Film
programme.desc: Available on October 30th, 2021 -The exhilaration of autumn in the Colorado Rockies and High Sierras awaits you in our latest film release! Soar over the brilliant aspen forests of Colorado, immerse yourself in the glowing autumn leaves, and bask in the golden light of sunrise on the high mountain peaks. The inspiring scenery is accompanied by a soothing ambient music soundtrack. Available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv. Runtime 2.5 Hours.

programme.title: Cameron Vs. Justin & Jessica
programme.desc: S1:E13 Cameron Diaz was one of the biggest stars in the world. So why did she leave it all behind? Our team uncovers a link between Cameron’s explosive breakup with Justin Timberlake and her choice to leave acting behind. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Cameron?Justin sparked cheating rumors when he moved on from Cameron 4 days later with Jessica Biel. Our team gets to the truth behind those rumors to reveal the role Justin played in Cameron disappearing and the truth is even more shocking…

programme.title: Ariana Grande vs. Pete Davidson
programme.desc: S1:E11 What made Kanye West go to war against Pete Davidson? Kanye is relentlessly going after Pete, so much so, that Kim Kardashian is concerned about the safety of her new boyfriend. Is it because Kanye knows Pete’s history of controversial relationships? Our team got the real story behind the tabloids, the truth behind Pete’s behavior in relationships, and the journey he went on to truly start loving who he is.

programme.title: Drake Vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E16 Drake went from hip hop hero to deadbeat dad when Kanye West collaborator Pusha T revealed Drake was hiding a secret son, but why was he hiding his son in the first place? And how did Pusha know about it?Everybody assumed Kanye had leaked the information because he was threatened by Drake’s success, but the truth is way more complicated.After digging into Drake and Kanye’s feud and friendship, our team discovered the real story behind Drake’s secret son and the journey he went on to embrace fatherhood for himself.

programme.title: Gwen Stefani vs. Gavin Rossdale
programme.desc: S1:E3 When Gwen Stefani’s happy 20-year relationship with Gavin Rossdale came crashing down, and she started dating Blake Shelton right after the divorce, the media went crazy. Discover the real story of the months of media torture Gwen had to go through, and where she is now in her new relationship with her new man.

programme.title: Winona Ryder vs. Johnny Depp
programme.desc: S1: E10 Johnny Depp’s trial with Amber Heard had everyone talking, but wait until you hear about Winona Ryder’s. Johnny experienced love at first sight and became obsessed with Winona. But after their breakup, Winona dealt with mental health issues and her own very public trial, which has some striking similarities with Johnny and Ambers. Everyone thought she was a crazy, and the aftermath of her court case left her banished from the world. Winona went through a great awakening outside of the public eye and bounced back into Hollywood.

programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: The Rise Of Fredia Gibbs
programme.desc: S1:E6 Fredia Gibbs was the first female African American kickboxing world champion who learned how to fight as a child because she grew up scared and afraid. It wasn’t until she unknowingly got into a van alone after a party with a man who turned out to be a serial killer, that all the years of fighting and training would help her unleash the power she had inside of her and catapult her to new heights.

programme.title: The Rise of Wim Hof
programme.desc: S1:E1 The Iceman (Wim Hof), a man seemingly immune to freezing temperatures, who once climbed Mount Everest only in his shorts and shoes sounds like a fictional superhero. But Wim isn’t invincible to pain, in fact, the opposite. The worst tragedy he’s suffered was the catalyst that inspired him to master his mind and body and help millions do the same.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: Inky Johnson: Knocked Down to Rise Up - Shattered Dream
programme.desc: Growing up in poverty, Inky Johnson dreamt of a better life -- one where he could provide for his family. A gifted football player, Inky was on his way to this dream -- playing college football & getting named a definite First Round NFL Draft pick, but tragedy struck when he was just 10 games away from the NFL. What happened next will inspire you to never give up on your dreams, no matter the obstacles you might encounter.

programme.title: Paul de Gelder: Saved by Sharks
programme.desc: In 60 years, no one had been attacked by a shark in Sydney Harbour... Until one day, it happened to Navy diver Paul de Gelder! How did he survive? What drove him to fight for his life?

programme.title: Alicia Kozakiewicz: Friend or Predator?
programme.desc: At just 13 years old, Alicia Kozakiewicz stepped outside her family home and into every parent’s worst nightmare. She’d agreed to meet the “friend” with whom she’d been chatting online for six months, but by the time she realized this man was a deranged predator, it was too late. How did she manage to stay alive? And what traumatic lesson does Alicia want all parents and teens to hear?

programme.title: 18 Years Of Horror: The Jaycee Lee Dugard Story
programme.desc: Jaycee Lee Dugard had her life stolen from her when she was kidnapped in broad daylight by a man with an evil and vicious record. Despite being locked in a soundproof shed for 18 years, Jaycee’s family never stopped searching for her. How did Jaycee survive?

programme.title: Kevin Berthia: The Golden Gate Bridge Guardian Angel
programme.desc: Kevin Berthia tells the true story of how the power of listening and hope saved him from the darkest moment of his life on the Golden Gate Bridge.

programme.title: Billy Monger: Unstoppable Teen
programme.desc: Billy Monger was on the track to becoming a child Formula 4 star. But days before his birthday, Billy suffered a horrendous crash that made headlines around the world and left him in critical condition. Can you imagine your own kid in the seat of a race car going up to 200 MPH?

programme.title: GSP: Behind The Mask
programme.desc: As a child, Georges St-Pierre was bullied relentlessly by an older and much bigger boy at his school. He was tortured, and humiliated on a daily basis, leading to years of built up anger and frustration. It was this traumatizing childhood experience that led him to study martial arts and become one of the most celebrated UFC Champions in the world. Years later, Georges faced his childhood bully once again. What he chose to do in that moment is nothing short of amazing.

programme.title: The Dark Past Of Funny Man Tyler Perry
programme.desc: Tyler Perry stepped into the limelight with his character, Madea. He played a hilarious, tough-love woman who shared countless lessons on self-esteem, respecting yourself, and staying strong. Behind the scenes though, Tyler lived a life of bitterness and rage. There was one person he couldn’t forgive and it nearly cost him everything.

programme.title: Tererai Trent: Higher Education
programme.desc: Forced to marry at 14, Tererai Trent lived as an oppressed and silenced woman. When her husband found out about Tererai’s secret dream of getting her PhD, he beat her and told her “a woman belongs in the kitchen.” What Tererai does next shocks everyone and reminds all of us that no matter what your dream is, IT IS ACHIEVABLE.

programme.title: Lauren Wasser: The Model With Golden Legs
programme.desc: Lauren Wasser was thriving as a young fashion model, but her life quickly took a dramatic turn when she fell victim to Toxic Shock Syndrome. What started as a normal day for Lauren ended with her being found on the bedroom floor just 10 minutes away from losing her life. Luckily, Lauren survived but was tragically forced to lose both her legs. It seemed like her fashion career was over. But instead, the unthinkable happened.

programme.title: A Father's Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: Should parents control their children or trust them to do the right thing?

programme.title: Here's the #1 Trap That Will Ruin Your Retirement
programme.desc: Retirement is often seen as a golden period in ones life, filled with opportunities for leisure, family time, personal growth, and giving back to the community. However, there is a common trap that many retirees fall into that jeopardizes the quality of their golden years.

programme.title: 15 Retirement Activities That Will Keep You Active and Engaged
programme.desc: Retirement is a phase in life that many of us look forward to, but it can be a daunting prospect if youre not sure how to fill your newfound free time. Its not just about the size of your portfolio or your financial preparedness; its also about having a plan for what youll do during your retirement. James explores 15 exciting ideas and activities to help you create a fun and fulfilling retirement.

programme.title: WARNING! This Medicare Surcharge is Going Up in 2024!
programme.desc: Today, Marvin Musick from Medicare School offers a clear and detailed explanation of Medicares costs and surcharges set for 2024. Marvin reveals the Medicare expenses, countering the common misconception that its a free or minimal-cost service. He outlines the various financial components involved in Medicare, such as premiums, deductibles, co-pays, co-insurance, and the distinctive excess charges. Marvin details Medicare Part A, Medicare Part B, Medicare Part C (Advantage Plans), and Medicare Part D (Prescription Drugs), pinpointing the standard fees and the extra charges that individuals with higher incomes might encounter. He explains the Income-Related Monthly Adjustment Amount (IRMAA) and how it relates to the Medicare surcharges.

programme.title: WARNING: Why I Would NEVER Choose An Advantage Plan for 2024!
programme.desc: Join Marvin Musick from Medicare School as he tells you the hidden truths behind Medicare Advantage Plans for 2024. Facing an expected hike in the Medicare B premium? Are you puzzled by these medicare plans geographic limitations and not-so-obvious restrictions? Marvin provides a comprehensive breakdown, touching on the critical points of financial burdens, the confinements of network choices, and the frustrations tied to prior authorization challenges. Plus, discover the long-term implications of choosing an Advantage plan and how it might shape your future healthcare decisions. While considering Medicare options for the Annual Enrollment Period, stay informed and be prepared for whats ahead. Dont miss out!

The Realm SD
programme.desc: Teton Gravity Research's The Realm brings you the ultimate documentation of freeriding’s relentless revolution. Explore Jackson Hole, Alaska, Utah, Japan, British Columbia, Europe, New Zealand, and Hawaii's Jaws.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking the Rideau Canal - Part 2
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he continues his houseboat and kayak trip along the Rideau River. Ken is joined by his wife and daughter, as they paddle through the locks of the canal and enjoy some quality family time on the water.

programme.title: Out Of Frame
programme.desc: Out Of Frame shows the daily life of Mathis Dumas, athlete, high mountain guide and outdoor photographer. A life suspended in the void, a camera in hand, Mathis takes us behind the scenes of a vertiginous highline shoot on a line never done before. A journey to the heart of the Mont Blanc massif where Mathis reveals his photographic vision and his mountain heritage outside the traditional framework.

programme.title: One For The Road
programme.desc: Join TGR's all-star athlete team as they travel the globe in search of deep snow, steep lines, and gnarly cliffs and couloirs on which to push the limits of skiing and snowboarding.

programme.title: Legacy - Surfing Now & Then
programme.desc: As the sport grows, more and more people surf. Do the surfing legends still relate to what pro surfing has become? Will surfing be as mainstream as other sports? Can you teach the Aloha Spirit to mainlanders and surfers from new demographics? Meet the surfing pioneers while they compete for a World Title in the Azores islands and get to know their views on what is still to come.

programme.title: Kayaking Québec City
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks along the Jacques Cartier River before heading to Québec City to explore the cobblestone streets and old buildings the UNESCO World Heritage Site is known for.

programme.title: Best of Untracked
programme.desc: Tag along with a number of Teton Gravity Research crews as they travel the world in search of the new and unknown throughout three seasons of Untracked, hitting all of the show's highlights.

programme.title: The Lifted Life
programme.desc: Tech CEO Charlie Piper needs custom builds for a RAM 3500 and a 2016 Jeep Wrangler.

programme.title: Earl Howe Trophy
programme.desc: Celebrating British-built pre-war sports cars, this race featured marques like Bentley, Aston Martin, and Frazer Nash, showcasing the elegance and engineering of early 20th-century racing.

programme.title: Wot A Night (1931)
programme.desc: On a dark and stormy night, Tom and Jerry, two ambitious cab drivers, wait outside a train station for fares. When two strange men in top hats disembark from their train, the hacks solicit them until they give in and ask for a ride to their castle. When the men stiff the fare, Tom and Jerry pursue them, only to be trapped inside the castle by a portcullis. They wander about the residence and encounter a fearsome-looking bat, a bathing, whistling skeleton, a veritable army of ghosts, and other assorted ghouls and goblins. After meeting a skeletal quartet in black-face, they find the two strange men again and discover they've been turned into skeletons as well, after which they escape the castle and run for their lives.

programme.title: Casper - Spooking About Africa (1957)
programme.desc: Casper is in an African jungle. He frightens a zebra at a watering hole. Wheezy the elephant has a terrible sneezing problem; he sneezes all the feathers off a peacock and a group of monkeys out of their perches. Casper decides to help, and in the process dislodges the feather that was making the elephant sneeze. But then a fire breaks out, and the elephant is unable to sneeze on command.

programme.title: Mr Know All
programme.desc: Elly Somerton is working for the summer as a hotel receptionist. She is intrigued by Max Kelada, a roguish archeology professor who is disarmingly honest with her about the tricks he uses to get women into bed. But when a rival of Kelada attempts to humiliate him, it turns out that Mr Know-All may not he the heartless seducer he professes to be.

programme.title: Felix The Ghost Breaker (1923)
programme.desc: Felix is trying to get some sleep in a graveyard, but keeps getting bothered by a ghost. He follows the ghost to the house of an old farmer, and the ghost proceeds to terrorize the old man, and when the farmer calls for help from the police, the ghost terrorizes them, too. Felix, however, suspects something fishy is going on, and with the help of the farmer's donkey, gets to the bottom of things.

programme.title: Jack the Ripper
programme.desc: A clairvoyant, in dreams and visions, sees a series of grisly murders in London's Whitechapel district. But his knowledge of the details of the crimes makes him a suspect in the eyes of the police.

programme.title: IN THE CLOSET
programme.desc: 2045, two brothers form the Black Foundation, a movement in the U. S. that suggests the Government apologize to slave descendants for their hardships, and bestow on them reparations by any means necessary.. ..Or Holy Hell will break loose.. Luke, the oldest son, discovers the power and guidance of Christ and tries to save himself but his brother and father as well.Wrong actions brings a Demon into the life of the two brothers:Will Christ prevail, or will the Demons efforts consume the Maxwell Family?

programme.title: BELL RUNG
programme.desc: A compelling documentary on the effect of concussions on football players and their families. From sleeplessness to suicide, it reveals a complex portrait of life after the gridiron.

programme.title: THE LITTLE THINGS
programme.desc: THE LITTLE THINGS is an indie rom-com with a supernatural twist. It tells the story of Dee (Kathryn Beck), a woman who believes she has the gift to alter peoples destinies... provided she never leaves her home. However, when the possibility of eviction threatens her powers, her only hope is Mitch (Chris Hillier). She affected her first love and the first life with her special gift, but he may not be so willing to help when he finds out his entire life has been manipulated.

programme.title: Bloody war in Xiang River Part II
programme.desc: After the central column crossed the Xiangjiang River from the Jieshou pontoon bridge, enemy planes blew up the pontoon bridge. The 34th Division of the Fifth Red Army was ordered to block the Guangxi army going north from Guanyang. Due to changes in the enemys situation and unfamiliarity with the terrain, they lost in the mountains of northern Guangxi and arrived at the ferry late. The leading troops of the Red 8th Army arrived at the Xiangjiang River one after another. At this time, the Jieshou pontoon bridge had been blown up, and the Jieshou Ferry had also been occupied by the Gui army. The Central Revolutionary Military Commission ordered Sword of Xingguo, who had already crossed the river, to return and find a ferry on the Xiangjiang River, and cooperated with the Red 5th Army and the Red 8th Army to cross the river. Through investigation and detection, the Sword of Xingguo successfully found an ancient underwater hidden dam in Fenghuangzui, 10 kilometers downstream of Jieshou, which can be waded. The Red 2nd Division fought fiercely with the Hunan Army. In order to avoid being divided and surrounded, the Red 1st and Red 2nd Divisions retreated to Xiabitian, Shuitou, Chilanpu, and Baishapu successively. The Central Revolutionary Military Commission ordered the Red 1st Army to hold its position at any cost in order to open up a road to the west. Under the cover of aircraft, the Hunan Army launched a fierce attack by adopting the tactics of frontal attack and roundabout encirclement. The Red 1st and Red 2nd Divisions fought hard to cover the main force of the Red Army to cross the Xiangjiang River at noon and march westward. Relying on the condescending favorable terrain, the 10th regiment repelled the Gui armys repeated attacks, and took the initiative to attack in the dark of night to hold its position. The Gui army changed its tactics. While attacking frontally, the main force attacked the 11th and 12th regiments of the 4th Division in Jieshou along the west bank of the Xiang River. After fierce fightin

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 48
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: GET THAT GLOVE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Glove of the North in the Magic Fort. Amkko and Koto attack the fort with a Rock-Eating Mutant. The Guardians manage (eventually) to transform into the Dragon, Panther, and Rodent Warriors to drive them off.

programme.title: Paintastic
programme.desc: Dunky has been entrusted the task of painting the house. While he is out and about religiously doing his chores a wild chase between Keet and Cat is going on in the background.

programme.title: Charlies Castle
programme.desc: It’s Uncle Charlie’s birthday and the twins have surprised him with a nap mask and breakfast, but the twins want to celebrate a little more by throwing a party and inviting all their friends. Although Charlie wishes to have a more peaceful celebration, he gives in to the pleas of Boris and Sandy. After getting a hint from Charlie on how much he loves chess, boris and sandy plan the birthday party around a ‘knights and castles’ theme. The twins get Deedee to bring balloons, a castle cake with turrets from Tiggy and a jousting dance from Mewmew. Boris and Sandy set out to decorate Uncle Charlie’s house, just in time for their friends coming in with all the goodies for the party. They even invent a balloon jousting game between Deedee and Mewmew that makes Mewmew crash into Tiggy’s cake and thereby wreck all the arrangements much to the dismay of the twins. This calls for Deedee’s magic where all the party ingredients are put into a large purple cauldron and it makes a gigantic bouncing castle in the chequerboard garden. And the snoring sounds lead them to find Uncle Charlie napping right inside it. They bounce around Uncle Charlie as much as they can and then wind down for a long snooze. Uncle Charlie awakes to happily find that the twins have organised his most best birthday slumber party ever.

programme.title: Drill Bit
programme.desc: One day as the shop opens, Sundar sees a well-built fireman perform a fire drill for a small bunch of kids just outside the shop. Thoroughly in awe, Sundar wants to become a firefighter and much to Chai Rajas consternation, Sundar starts converting all his chores about the shop into fire-fighter training drills. Customers and Chai Raja go crazy as Sundar becomes over- zealous about becoming a fireman. However he is extremely clumsy and not to forget Basha who manages to make this training even more nerve-wracking for Chai Raja and the customers with his naughty pranks. There may be no fire but Chai Raja will surely conk out of heartburn if Sundar doesnt quickly end his training and resume waiting.

programme.title: See The Problem
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: Gummy’s place is transformed into a frozen world, where he, Harry and Kala have loads of slippery fun together while trying to figure out what’s happened in the hopes of fixing it.

programme.title: Kiwi, flightless birds
programme.desc: When the gods were still ruling the world, when trees and flowers on the ground began to wither due to insects, the goddess WI-Go asks Kiwi to do the hard work of catching insects, and she readily accepts the GoGo.

programme.title: AWARD PE AWARD
programme.desc: A local committee makes a surprise visit to hotel Kelifornia and presents Chai Raja with the Best Chef Award. Chai Raja is thrilled and places the award on the shelf and gives the duty of safe-guarding it to Sundar. And suddenly Basha develops a fascination for the trophy. Instantly, poor Sundars life turns into living hell. Things reach a crazy climax when the trophy from Sundars hands falls on the ground and breaks into a hundred pieces right in front of Chai Rajas eyes. Chai Raja is literally shivering in fury, Sundar is literally shivering in fear and Basha is literally shivering trying to control his laughter. And that very moment the local committee comes again with a larger trophy. A surprised Chai Raja gracefully takes a bow to accept yet another award. But to everyones sheer shock, the committee gives the trophy to Sundar for being the best waiter. And Chai Raja and Basha faint instantly...followed by Sundar!!!

programme.title: Sleepwalker
programme.desc: Gummy sleepwalks – making himself an elaborate snack and proving that you can sometimes even have fun while you’re asleep!

programme.title: Be a Friend, Make a Friend
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: BULL-DOZER
programme.desc: It is harvest festival and the backyard of Hotel Kelifornia is transformed into a muddy field.Basha and Sundar are the usual chasing self. The duo soon finds that it is bull racing competition happening in the backyard makeshift field. Basha in all his style is ready to participate. Chai Raja is very excited to see a buzzing crowd around his hotel which means good business. Sundar who get busy with serving and excited about the racing gets a jealous competitive streak when he sees Basha. Sundar sneaks out and is ready to race. The third participant is a lanky frail kid with two thinner bulls. The race is on. And Basha and Sundar soon gets into chasing each other messing each others racing and everything around them. It is a hilarious spectacle for the crowd and a horrifying experience for Chai Raja. And race ends with a thoroughly beaten Basha and Sundar losing to the lanky kid who still cant believe that he won since he and the skinny bulls just walked through the race. The story ends with Chai Raja putting both Sundar and Basha to clean up the whole mess they created.

programme.title: The Fallen Star
programme.desc: Maestra Saku teaches the Guardians how to connect with the constellations and make use of their powers. Pai is terrified of bats, but when a meteorite falls into the Shadowy Hollow, he has no choice but to connect with the bat constellation. As a result, he manages to beat the Rock-Eating Mutant and his phobia at the same time.

programme.title: Dude's Lagoon
programme.desc: When a mermaid seeks his help because a sea monster is destroying her home, Dude has to figure out a way to stop the creature, especially when he learns its Sneevil and Biggs latest contraption.

programme.title: What CeCe Saw
programme.desc: Upon discovering the Creepy Candy TM fooling around in his secret laboratory again, Victor crams them into his lunchbox. Soon after, he bumps into CeCe OMalley, the new girl at school, and their lunchboxes accidently get switched. Once Victor realizes this He chases after CeCe to keep her from opening the lunchbox.Can Victor get to her in time before she opens the lunchbox? Can he stop her from discovering his secret about the Creepy Candy TM? Will Cece learn about the other creepy secrets the old library holds?

programme.title: Super Fireworks Show
programme.desc: Nardy celebrates the Light Region Light Show with edible fireworks, while Sneevil makes a volcano erupt with flowing lava, threatening all of the Smighties. Its up to the Super Six to use their powers and save the day.

programme.title: KUSHTI ME MASTI
programme.desc: It is a regular morning in hotel Kelifornia until the much feared wrestler comes in for food. Sundar is all set to please him. But things go for a toss when the wrestlers arch-rival comes in and expects to be served by Sundar. A hapless Sundar is torn between the two angry fat men. And to add to the misery is our super mischievous Basha who is making sure that Sundar messes up everything with the wrestlers. The chain of events reach a point where the wrestlers start a kushti fight inside the hotel and BashamakES sure that Sundar becomes their punching bag. Will Sundars luck save him?!!!

programme.title: Dinner Plans
programme.desc: A free entry pass into a posh hotel! What more do Don and Colonel need! But there is competition at the house. From the door of the limousine to the hotel roof top, the rats make it impossible for Don and Colonel to enjoy this rare luck of theirs. But, when in need, they all stand together. After all, what are friends for??!!

programme.title: Trick or Creep
programme.desc: Its Halloween and the Creepy Candy concoct a plan to trick poor Mr. Finkle. Their spooky prank has everyone at the library creeped out. Will Mr. Finkle discover it was them? Will he get even? Watch to find out!

programme.title: Show Time
programme.desc: We start the show with a close up of the remote the camera pulls out to see Keet picking the remote and starts watching the last episode of “ Bigger boss” a reality show on TV.

programme.title: BANANA BANG!
programme.desc: Its Diwali and Sundar is extremely excited for he loves everything about Diwali...the fireworks, the lights and the sweets. Chai Raja though doesnt mind the mellower ones has an aversion to the noisy crackers as they drown out his precious radio and disturb his swilling rhythm. Also Chai Raja needs to concentrate as he has to whip up special jalebis, coconut laddoos and other sweets to entice customers into his shop even on the holiday. Customers do pour in but with an excess of kids and their Diwali pistols. Sundar already has his hands full keeping the knicker-clad pint-sized cops and robbersincheck..little does he know its just about to get worse for Basha has received a special Diwali hamper from one of his old fans at the circus- the cannon clown- a huge box of the biggest and loudest firecrackers. Basha descends with a decided bang on the tea shop and proves to be such a ballistic bother that despite all Sunders efforts the tale ends with the Chai Raja and his hotel getting a Diwali makeover that a is bit too charred than Sundar would have intended.

programme.title: The Wet Cat
programme.desc: Cat is chasing Keet in the mud and gets dirty, GrandPA is in the garden watering the plants he points the hose pipe to Cat and gets him wet and tells Dunky to give him a long due bath. Much to Keets amusement.

programme.title: Wheres Kala?
programme.desc: When Kala wants to practise her stealth moves, Gummy and Harry volunteer to help her. Soon Kala is scaring them from various hiding places. After a while the duo doesn’t find Kala anymore, they go too paranoid thinking that Kala is plotting an elaborate scaring plan. Gummy and Harry do all sort of crazy things until they find out that Kala actually went away for her audition in the middle of the game.

programme.title: RAIN IN KELIFORNIA
programme.desc: It is monsoon time and the teashop is leaking at various places. The customers are irritated with rain drops trickling on their head, clothes and even into their tea tumblers. And they start leaving the shop. A tensed Chai Raja orders Sundar to put a sheet over the roof. Sundar obediently and effectively does it and comes back. But Basha seizes the opportunity and wants to have some fun. It is leak marathon in the teashop with a group of suffering customers, angry Chai Raja and a panic stricken Sundar. At last when the entire roof flies off and it is literally monsoon inside the teashop, Basha stylishly comes outside the shop holding a giant umbrella. And all the customers run under it and have their steaming teas and snacks. An angry Chai Raja whacks Sundar and ask him to learn something from the smart Basha!

programme.title: SuperCat
programme.desc: Cat watches his favorite super hero “SuperCat” on tv and is inspired to be like him in every way even fly like him.

programme.title: The Zoo Trip
programme.desc: Chaos unfolds as Chottu Mottu Lambu Don and Colonel decide to make a trip to the zoo. Starting from feeding the animals, from sneaking into the control room and opening the enclosures and racing crocodiles, they mess it all.

programme.title: Tota Raja
programme.desc: Chai Raja adopts a parrot (without a cage) who suddenly considers himself master of the cafe. Sundar now has to take orders from the parrot, who assumes the role of Chai Rajas second-in-command. Sundar detests the parrot but has to take good care of him to make Chai Raja happy. Basha decides to take advantage. He drops water on the parrot and the blame falls on Sundar. The parrot makes Sundars life miserable and Basha too gets caught in the parrots wrath. Sundar and Basha team up and find a way to make Chai Raja fire the parrot.

programme.title: Star to Star
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: MONKEY KALARI
programme.desc: A Kalari Gurukkal does a demonstration outside the Chai shop and suddenly the hotel has a massive swell of customers jostling in. Chai Raja is thrilled at the sudden pile of customers as tea glasses and snacks fly off the counter and even the flies are shooed off their hangout for lack of space. The extra publicity is great and Chai Raja sends out a complimentary snack plate with Sundar to the Kalari Guru- Basha planning to swipe a few complimentary snacks himself follows Sundar but then stops short as he sees the high leaps and stunts of the Gurukkal suddenly Basha is extremely interested in learning the art. (Basha sees the kalari moves as a easy way to out-of reach snack shelves). He approaches the teacher, but the latter is a stern man and is not easily coaxed. Basha tries buttering up the Gurukkal- at first the lazy Sundar doesnt clue in but when he realizes that Basha plans to use the Kalari moves to chomp away the fries kept for the customers. Sundar decides (thought bubbles) to master the art himself and beat Basha before he can succeed. Now the Kalari Guru has two very-very interested/undesired disciples who are intent on learning- or not letting the other one learn- Kalari! Add to this the fact that Chai Raja is losing his cool thanks to Sundar neglecting the customers and his job for the sake of the lessons. Sundar has to dash off for a bit and Basha creates his own Kalari moves. Its no time for monkeying but will Sundar realize that before its too late?

programme.title: The Lightning Strikes
programme.desc: Its raining heavily and the three are nicely tucked in the sofa and watching a tv show as the tv goes out.

programme.title: Two Tickets.
programme.desc: When Gummy wins two tickets to a big dance show, each of his best pals vie to be the one he gives the coveted second ticket to.

programme.title: Train Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is in for a calm and peaceful train journey. And then the hilarious pests enter the scene. The trio is having a time of their life; but at the cost of Don and Colonel. Their train journey is a colossal disaster. But, would the rats get away with it?? He he hell no!

programme.title: Friends or Foes
programme.desc: Its friendship day and Dunky makes both Keet and Cat share friendship bands with each other and makes them promise to maintain friendship for a day at least.

programme.title: Better Than You
programme.desc: Pancake must come to terms with not being better at something than his little sister Maple, which is mirrored in the Zooniverse when he tries to help the Zoonicorns build Jiggly Stone wall. Even when you’re not the best at something, you can always be helpful.

programme.title: More Ways Than One
programme.desc: When Pancake cuts Maple’s toast differently than Mama does, it sends Maple into a tailspin. Then in the Zooniverse an art competition shows her that different can be good. There can be more than one way to do things, and each can be right.

programme.title: Harold's Missing Spoon
programme.desc: On a gusty day, Pancake has lost his favorite hat, and he’s looked EVERYWHERE, finally giving up and thinking maybe someone snatched it – Maple. The younger otter denies it (despite a history of “borrowing” stuff from Pancake and not putting any of it back), but Pancake doesn’t believe her. He goes to sleep thinking his little sister has his hat.When he arrives in the Zooniverse, he finds the Zoonicorns are in the midst of a Harold Crisis: the bear has lost one of his prized spoons!

programme.title: Chill out!
programme.desc: The twins find themselves in the gaming world where an irascible frog is very angry: no wonder nobody ever wants to play with him, unless...

programme.title: Superragoo!
programme.desc: The twins and Ragoo come to a house in which objects speak. They are very concerned because Tim, the young master, is still asleep and must arrange the party for his birthday. Tim is awakened by Ragoo but, despite being late, he wants to do everything himself.

programme.title: Rocking Chair
programme.desc: GrandPAs chair has broken and wants Dunky to make a new one. Dunky agrees to make it for him and gets into action in the verandah.

programme.title: The hidden champion
programme.desc: Ragoo brings in a small seashell necklace and the twins find themselves under the sea, where they meet Finny, a little fish whos too shy to play with the other fish.

programme.title: Dolphin Tales
programme.desc: Dunky has taken a small picnic bag and takes Keet to the lake. A nice day as by the lake very peaceful. Keet sees two dolphins in the lake and plays with them as they get friendly with each other. The prowling Cat is not too happy. And tries various antics to catch Keet with funny results. The dolphins become good friends with Keet and teach Cat a lesson to remember for a longtime

programme.title: Mr. Pancake's Wild Ride
programme.desc: Pancake doesn’t follow instructions and goes on a wild joy ride! Understanding and following directions is important.

programme.title: Plastic Bag
programme.desc: Why throw the plastic bags away? Upcycling and reusing are Hepi and Brikos favourite thing to do

programme.title: Abracadabra
programme.desc: Keet is tired of Cat chasing her all the time. She finds a book in the attic on “Great magic tricks” and soon masters them. now its time to use them.

programme.title: Marco's Garden
programme.desc: The neighboring dog Moti is very fussy about his Garden of the house and takes his job seriously to guard it.

programme.title: A “Bumpy” Trek
programme.desc: Don and Colonel went up the hill, to feast a platter, Colonel fell down and broke his bones and Don came tumbling after. Rocky terrain of the magic mountain and a sleepy Don is indeed a disastrous combination. So what you think awaits the team on the peak of this mountain?

programme.title: Robo-Gummy
programme.desc: Finding himself over-committed to too many things, Gummy orders a few duplicate robots of himself... who winds up in the end causing more trouble than they’re worth!

programme.title: SCHOOL’S OUT!
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to play Bingo, Pai and Xia say it’s party time! They get April to dance, but she loses her fan, which falls down to the Chou World. Amkko and Koto use it to fly up to the Yan World on the giant mutant chicken. While April distracts the mutants with tango lessons, Xia and Pai send the chicken packing.

programme.title: Talent Show
programme.desc: As Dunky warms up the milk in the morning he hears the “The Great Indian talent show” announcement coming to town. He’s all excited. He goes to his room , gets out his old song record disk - blows off the dust and puts it on the gramophone .

programme.title: Knot My Problem
programme.desc: Maple keeps forgetting how to tie her shoes until Promi shows her a way to remember. Practice makes perfect, and perseverance leads to achievement.

programme.title: Catch That Bird
programme.desc: Don has adopted a baby pigeon, but can he save it from 5 grumbling tummies? The three mice, Balu and Colonel are adamant on having baby pigeon pie and a mighty havoc ensues. But the kin & kith of the little pigeon have other plans and you have to watch to find out who ultimately ends up on the stove!

programme.title: Day At The Museum
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want a pleasant day at the museum. But there are three surprise visitors – the trio. And as they enter, the museum runs haywire. The mummies come to life, the swords fly around and Don is running for his life. How will this all end???

programme.title: The Contest
programme.desc: Rich eccentric Grumpy McCrab launches a contest with a huge prize for whoever can go longest without laughing, smiling, singing or dancing. Miraculously, Gummy winds up among the finalists..

programme.title: Little big lizard
programme.desc: The twins help a tiny lizard who everyone was ignoring, find a princesss ring and save the day.

programme.title: The baby dromedary
programme.desc: The twins help a little pharaoh to find his lost pet, a baby dromedary.

programme.title: A Sweet Rush
programme.desc: What began as a tug of war for a six layered cake culminated in Don fixing a security alarm to the kitchen door that stopped anyone from stepping in, even Don himself. Lary Marly and Charly have found a way to dance themselves to the fridge escaping the floor sensors.

programme.title: Bear essentials
programme.desc: The twins help a young owl who misses her best friend bear.

programme.title: Socks
programme.desc: Not just to keep your feet warm, Hepi and Briko have some interesting sock themed ideas

programme.title: The Garden Guardians
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to take care of their vegetable garden while they go on a trip. Xia and April think it’s the dullest job ever, but Pai is over the moon. Negu seizes the chance to send his Mutant Beetles, who try to wreck the garden, making Pai’s life impossible. He has to use a secret known only to the most green-fingered gardeners to beat the Mutants and save the garden.

programme.title: Catch That Bird
programme.desc: Don has adopted a baby pigeon, but can he save it from 5 grumbling tummies? The three mice, Balu and Colonel are adamant on having baby pigeon pie and a mighty havoc ensues. But the kin & kith of the little pigeon have other plans and you have to watch to find out who ultimately ends up on the stove!

programme.title: Electric Chase
programme.desc: They are so fed up of the rats that colonel comes up with an idea to tame them – an electronic super cat! And it works! The rats are terrified of it. Now it is the rule of the dogs. Until..until the idea backfires. Watch it for a hilarious time.

programme.title: Remote War
programme.desc: Don and the terrific trio are at war for the TV remote. It all comes down to a swallowed remote that changes channels with every hiccup. Now that is very convenient. The mice get ready in Scuba Gear to perform a close tummy surgery to save the remote. Will sentimental soap or Jolly Good cricket win the Toss?

programme.title: The Washed - Away Planet
programme.desc: Aladdin is entrusted to deliver a very precious necklace. When Jamillah arrives she knocks into him and out of worry for the necklace he opens the box but then it accidentally drops down a drain! He knows how expensive that necklace is, it would take him 20 years to earn enough to pay for it so he resigns himself to trying to find a job so that he can start earning the money back. Meanwhile Jamillah calls on Genie to help him get the necklace back and after some sifting around he finds it in the drain and Aladdin is able to deliver it on time.

programme.title: Harvest Attack
programme.desc: Its harvest time and Dunky has given Cat the duty of protecting the fields with a sling and pebbles and Keet is to give him warnings if Hoodie the crow attacks the field with his gang

programme.title: Trekker's Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is visiting his distant cousin in a remote area .the next day Dunky has woken up early and takes the sleepy parrot Keet and Cat for a morning trek to the mountains.

programme.title: Don In Pain
programme.desc: Don happens to eat a ‘metallic hot dog’ which gave him a bad tooth. Now he wants it removed. Colonel tries everything possible. Even the rats come to offer their ‘help’. But that tooth just refuses to leave his mouth. At last, they are at the dentist’s and it is all funny and hilarious!

programme.title: I Gotta Go !
programme.desc: Rise and Shine Don- it’s a normal morning at the Doggy household…but wait.. whats the mice upto in the bathroom…Looks like there is no way Don can start his day normally ever!

programme.title: Laundry Business
programme.desc: It is laundry day for Don. And the rats are blocking his way from the first step itself. The whole place is a mess. But when Colonel comes in the picture, the war goes to the next level. Thanks to the rats, Don and Colonel now have nothing to wear.

programme.title: Assaf The Magician – Aladdin
programme.desc: On this occasion, SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the tale of “Aladdin and the Magic Lamp”. The Sultan, the PRINCESS’s father, requires their detective services, as the evil magician ASSAF has returned and has stolen ALADDIN’s lamp. Not content with this, the perfidious magician has ordered the GENIE kill ALADDIN and then take his palace, with the PRINCESS inside, and transport it to his lair, in the distant Atlas Mountains. SANDRA will face the most powerful magician in the Thousand and One Nights with her only weapon: her ingenuity.

programme.title: The Red Button
programme.desc: Fred insists Brains let him watch over her lab while she visits her father’s Space Station. She agrees under one rule: “Don’t press the red button.” The entire time she’s gone, he can think of nothing else.

programme.title: 1,2,3… Smile~
programme.desc: Duda discovers Dadas digital camera. Suddenly, he becomes hooked on taking photos. Scot shows up thinking they are going on a picnic. But, he finds out that they are going swimming in the lake instead. Ashamed of not knowing how to swim, Scot tries to practice in a kiddie pool when no one is around. Unfortunately, Duda captures Scots embarrassing moment on camera. Afraid that Duda will show the photo to others, Scot is determined to delete it at all costs. After losing his boat to Duda in a bet, Scot becomes frantic when he sees his friends taking a ride on it with Duda and his camera. Without thinking, Scot jumps into the lake to go after them. Will Scot be okay?

programme.title: Fairy Dust_Based On Sleeping Beauty
programme.desc: In the tale of Sleeping Beauty, the Prince kisses the Princess, expecting her to finally awaken from her long sleep. But, against all the odds, the Princess sleeps on. SANDRA, assisted by FO, discovers that the Princess’s lips are covered in magic dust. One of the characters in the tale of Sleeping Beauty does not want the princess to ever wake up

programme.title: Once Upon a Time Part 2
programme.desc: After accidentally landing Aladdin in jail, Jamillah comes up with a brilliant plan to break him out. Dressed as a guard, Jamillah approaches the cell and confidently tells the dozy guard that he is dismissed. Her confidence confuses him and she and Genie get Aladdin out. Aladdin cant believe he has a genie and races off shouting joyfully to all of Baghdad.

programme.title: It's OK To Make Mistakes
programme.desc: Dada and Bubbles make a delicious dish together. Soon, Duda shows up and wants to decorate it with ketchup, but ends up pouring it all over Bubble. Meanwhile, Caber is busy organizing his books at home. Duda comes and offers to help, but only causes more mess. Later, Duda sees an apple and tries to pick it for Bubble; Unfortunately, he loses his balance and falls into a paint that splatters all over Pinkar. Poor Duda is having a very bad day. With the help of Scots Time Machine, Duda decides to travel back in time and fix his "mistakes." Will Duda be able to undo his mistakes? Or will he discover something quite surprising?

programme.title: THAT SINKING FEELING
programme.desc: Mei decides to impress Negu with an art museum. He has the Rock-Eating Mutant pull down old buildings to build the museum. The Guardians’ “island” starts to sink. Pai “fishes” for the cause of the sinking and pulls up the Mutant, whom they entice to eat something besides rocks.

programme.title: The Easter Episode
programme.desc: Wheres the Easter Bunny? And what are chocolate bunny eggs? Gummy and Friends are about to find out

programme.title: LOVE IS BLIND
programme.desc: Fulfilling the Elders’ assignment to wrangle clouds, Pai falls in love with a rodent girl named Lol. But Lol proves to be one of Negu’s mutants, intent on stealing the Glove of the North.

programme.title: GET THAT GLOVE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Glove of the North in the Magic Fort. Amkko and Koto attack the fort with a Rock-Eating Mutant. The Guardians manage (eventually) to transform into the Dragon, Panther, and Rodent Warriors to drive them off.

programme.title: It's Santa Claus!
programme.desc: Its a hot summer day, but Duda is reading a book about Santa Claus. Discovering that Santa Claus only gives gifts to children who do good deeds, Duda jumps at every opportunity he gets to help his friends. Later that day, Duda meets up with Pelly. Pelly is upset because she lost all her packages because of a hole in her coat. After seeing Pellys packages and his red jacket, Duda assumes he is Santa Claus. So he volunteers to help Pelly find the rest of his "gifts." He tells all his friends that Santa Claus has shown up, and they all join in looking for packages. They manage to find all the missing packages and bring them to Pelly. Duda excitedly asks Santa "Pelly" for a gift... however, Pelly has some disappointing news.

programme.title: Mess at Museum
programme.desc: Dunky takes Keet and Cat to the towns museum which is inside a home to a lot of precious artifacts.

programme.title: Blues para septiembre
programme.desc: Natalia salva a un perro atropellado y en la clínica veterinaria se encuentra con Oleg, su primer amor.

programme.title: La ciega vidente
programme.desc: Tras un accidente automovilístico y la muerte de su hija de ocho años, Yana cae en una profunda depresión

programme.title: Un amor que no tiene precio
programme.desc: La dueña de una tienda de segunda mano busca al dueño de una tetera antigua que cuesta más de 80 mil dólares.

programme.title: Esposa Ficticia
programme.desc: Para evitar que a su hijo se lo lleven al ejército, Ana organiza un matrimonio ficticio entre Ígor y Nina.

programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Investigative reporter Joshua Philipp examines the deeper meaning behind the day's news.

programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.desc: Los Pitufos navegan para salvar a Marco, que ha sido capturado por el Capitán Pedro Pimienta.

programme.title: La Pitufo Sinfonía
programme.desc: Los Pitufos son pequeños y alegres seres azules. ¡Sigue sus aventuras más emocionantes y mágicas!

programme.title: Peligro En La Aldea
programme.desc: El pérfido mago Gargamel está harto de la constante superioridad de los Pitufos.

programme.title: Los Pitufos Monstruosos
programme.desc: Los Pitufos son pequeños y alegres seres azules. ¡Sigue sus aventuras más emocionantes y mágicas!

programme.desc: Gargamel ha robado el gorro de cumpleaños de Papá Pitufo para atraer a los Pitufos hacia una trampa.

programme.title: Símbolos De Sabiduría
programme.desc: Pitufo Filósofo está desesperado por parecerse más a Papá Pitufo.

programme.desc: El malvado brujo Gargamel pide al mago Balthazar una receta para capturar a los pitufos.

programme.desc: Pim y Pom, dos gatitos, llevan a los niños a una aventura en el fascinante mundo del arte.

programme.title: A cantar con Fluffy la Conejita

Experience the crisp air and rustling leaves from a bird's-eye view, capturing the essence of fall in all its glory. This cinematic journey not only showcases nature’s artistry but also invites you to revel in the tranquility and splendor of the season. programme.title: Popeye's 20th Anniversary 1954
programme.desc: Popeye is being honored for his 20 years of films, in a dinner hosted by 'Bob Hope' (several other celebrities are present, like 'Jimmy Durante', Bing Crosby, 'Jerry Lewis' and 'Dean Martin'). When called on to make a speech, he instead shows clips from two of his movies. Bluto does a slow burn through this, finally stuffing Popeye's trophy onto Popeye's head - but the trophy is full of spinach, so Popeye clobbers Bluto.

programme.title: Fox Pop 1942
programme.desc: Hearing that silver foxes are all the rage in high society, a fox paints himself silver and gets himself trapped, finding out too late that it's only his fur anyone is interested in

programme.title: Me Musical Nephews 1942
programme.desc: Popeye's nephews have been practicing their music and are getting good, but it's bedtime. After Popeye puts them to bed, they discover that many of the things in their bedroom can also be used to make music. And they are also blessed with an uncanny ability to appear to sleep every time Popeye comes to check on them

programme.title: Little Nemo-1911
programme.desc: Little Nemo-1911

programme.title: The Weakly Reporter 1944
programme.desc: A newsreel spoof with WWII homefront gags, including rationing, air raid drills and women filling in men's jobs.

programme.title: Space Transformer 1985
programme.desc: Using new technology, a crew consisting of Captain Chi, Nancy, and the robots Baipam and Diatron 5, is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into Ivy's body in order to defeat the invaders. Enlisting benevolent beings found inside Ivy's body, the crew prepares for an inner space battle that can decide the fate of the world.

programme.title: Insect to Injury 1956
programme.desc: Popeye tries to get rid of termites before they ruin his newly built house.

programme.title: Felix Lends a Hand 1922
programme.desc: Trudging through the snow in his hometown, Felix sees a billboard advertising sunny Egypt, and says that he'd give four of his nine lives to be there rather than freezing in the snow. He then hears crying coming from his friend Abdul's carpet shop, and it turns out that Abdul's girlfriend has been kidnapped by an Egyptian sheik. Felix promises to rescue her, and hops on a magic carpet Abdul has lying around the shop, says the magic word and flies off to Egypt to keep his promise.

programme.title: Gumbasia 1955
programme.desc: Clay objects of all sizes, shapes and colors contort and reshape themselves to a jazz music score.

programme.title: Shuteye Popeye 1952
programme.desc: Popeye's snoring is keeping his resident mouse awake. The mouse fights back. Popeye makes a mistake: he traps the mouse in a spinach can that isn't completely empty.

programme.title: Boy Meets Dog 1938
programme.desc: A commercial short made for the Bristol-Myers Co. (plugging their toothpaste) that features the characters from the "Reg'lar Fellers" syndicated newspaper comic strip by Gene Byrnes. The plot concerns a boy who has an old grouch for a daddy, runs off, meets a dog and joins a gang of kids. Meanwhile,the old man has a nightmare,where he sees himself as an old sour puss because he doesn't take care of his teeth and gums. He sees an electric sign for Bristol-Myers toothpaste, and that sets him on a more positive course. (The few-seconds of film showing the sign represents the only commercial intrusion in this short)

programme.title: The Conceited General
programme.desc: Set in ancient China. After a great victory, the general becomes complacent and out of practice. When the enemy returns, he acts like a punk.

programme.title: Scotty Finds a Home 1935
programme.desc: A young anthropomorphic kitten wants a pet. He happens to find a puppy with no owner and takes him in. When the Scotty tracks mud into the house, Grandma says that her grandson cannot keep him. A transient bulldog is walking by as Grandma puts a pie in the windowsill to cool. He barges into the house and terrorizes the family, demanding they feed him. Scotty rushes back to the house and saves the family, causing Grandma to decide that they can keep him after all.

programme.title: April Maze-1930
programme.desc: Felix the Cat and his two nephews try to have a picnic, but a thunderstorm and a thieving rabbit prevent them.

programme.title: Little Boy Blue 1936
programme.desc: The Big Bad Wolf stalks Little Bo Peep and steals one of her sheep. She enlists Little Boy Blue and a dancing scarecrow to assist her and her mischievous black sheep in rescuing it. Singing, dancing, hilarity and impalement ensue.

programme.title: Midnight Manhunt-1945
programme.desc: In a cheap hotel room in New York City Jelke shoots gangster Joe Wells, takes a package from his pocket and flees.Wells staggers into an alley. On her way to her apartment above a wax museum, Sue Gallagher, a reporter for the Chronicle, finds Wells' body and hides his corpse among the wax-figures in the museum and calls her paper to send a photographer so she can get a scoop on the killing of Wells, who had a $5,000 reward for his capture, dead or alive. Meanwhile, Henry Miggs, the museum owner find the body and is ready to call the police but his handyman, Clutch Tracy tells him to conceal it and avoid suspicion. From this point on it is a game of where-is-the-body....and the stolen South American diamonds Wells was carrying.

programme.title: Pool Sharks-1915
programme.desc: Two romantic rivals play a game of pool for the hand of their lady love.

programme.title: The Greeks Had a Word for Them-1932
programme.desc: In this sophisticated comedy Jazz Age comedy, a trio of money-hungry women all have sugar daddies who keep them in the lap of luxury, even as they drive the men crazy. Each woman represents a different personality type, from sensitive, to kind-hearted, to difficult and untrustworthy. The twenties come roaring back with immorality and in-fighting

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show 1963; Season 3; Episode 27;Barney's First Car
programme.desc: It's a red-letter day in Mayberry when Barney decides to join the motoring world, but things go sour when his cream-puff turns out to be a lemon.

programme.title: Africa Screams 1949
programme.desc: Two booksellers search for diamonds in Africa, along the way meeting a visually-impaired gunner, a hungry lion, and a tribe of cannibals.

programme.title: You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!
Game previews, highlights and interviews from your favorite sport!
See what happened in the world of sports while you were sleeping!
The latest sports that you may have missed!
The Roy Rogers Show : S1E4: The Treasure of Howling Dog Canyon
programme.desc: A saloon girl marries a miner, then has him murdered to get a piece of the map to his treasure. She only needs one more piece to complete the map, and that piece is held by her murdered husband's stepson. She determines to get it from him, no matter what she has to do.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show: S2E8: The Blind Trail
programme.desc: The Range Rider and his young sidekick get involved in a town election when the crooked mayor tries to kidnap the beautiful daughter of his opponent. The mayor arranges for the Range Rider to be framed for murder and plans to have him killed when he tries to break out of jail.

programme.title: The Dude Ranger 1934
programme.desc: An Easterner inherits a cattle ranch, only to discover that thousands of cattle have been stolen. He secretly signs on as a hired hand at his own ranch to discover who's stealing them.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger: S1E2 - The Lone Ranger Fights On
programme.desc: The origin of the Lone Ranger's horse Silver and his use of silver bullets is explained.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger : S1E5 -Rustlers' Hideout
programme.desc: The Vance family settles right in the middle of a war between the Madden gang and local ranches. Despite the hostility to Fred Vance over his past, he decides he will not be run off this parcel of land. The Lone Ranger believes in Fred's innocence, and asks him to help stop the ranchers riding into an ambush and then set a counter trap for the gang after rescuing the son of one of the ranchers being held hostage.
